mapper.select: select count(*) from t_bed b,t_oldpeople o,t_storey s,t_room r,t_person p,t_dorm d where b.old_id=o.old_id and b.storey_id=s.storey_id and b.room_id=r.room_id and b.person_id=p.person_id and b.dorm_id=d.dorm_id

select b.` bed_id` bedId,b.bed_status,o.old_name oldName,s.storey_name storeyName,r.room_name roomName, p.person_name personName,d.dorm_name dormName from t_bed b LEFT JOIN t_oldpeople o on b.old_id=o.old_id LEFT JOIN t_storey s on b.storey_id=s.storey_id LEFT JOIN t_room r on b.room_id=r.room_id LEFT JOIN t_person p on b.person_id=p.person_id LEFT JOIN t_dorm d on b.dorm_id=d.dorm_id limit #{key_off},#{pageSize}
select b.` bed_id` bedId,b.bed_status,b.old_id,b.dorm_id,b.person_id,b.room_id,b.storey_id from t_bed b where ` bed_id` = #{bedId}
